author: Channel Awesome
description:
Doug looked at Kevin Smith's first film Clerks, now it's time to see if he likes his followup as much. DisneyCember continues with Mallrats.

Watch all DisneyCember here - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0AQIMR-tpomecW19RN2LNrdoqd5wFu4R

Watch the new NC - https://youtu.be/QwaqimDaVws

Mallrats is a 1995 American buddy comedy film written and directed by Kevin Smith and starring Jason Lee, Jeremy London, Shannen Doherty, Claire Forlani, Priscilla Barnes, and Michael Rooker. It is the second film in the View Askewniverse following 1994's Clerks. As in the other Askewniverse films, the characters Jay and Silent Bob feature prominently, and characters and events from other films are discussed. Several cast members, including Lee, Ben Affleck and Joey Lauren Adams, have gone on to work in several other Smith films. Comic-book icon Stan Lee appeared, as did Brian O'Halloran, the star of Smith's breakout feature Clerks. 

Twitch - https://twitch.tv/channelawesome
